DESCRIPTION: Creatures are Afflicted when they have 1 or more of the following effects, #yWeak, #yVulnerable, #yPoison, #yGoop, #ySoulfire, #ySuffering, #ySoul #ySnare
When Applied, enemy loses HP equal to their current #ySuffering NL Increase this by 1 whenever another #yAffliction is applied.
If the target dies while #ySoul #ySnared, #yCollect them.

Assists the Collector in battle by taking hits while they have #yAggro and being the source or target of different card effects. NL Cards that utilize an Ally explicitly cannot be played without one or without a living ally.
The Leading charater is the charater to be targeted by enemy Attacks.
The Back charater is the charater not being targeted by enemy Attacks currently.
When a #yCollected Monster dies, after combat it's #yCollectible will appear in a separate card reward, no more then 3 #yCollectibles can appear.
#yAggro causes your #yTorch #yHead to be attacked instead of you so long as it's greater than 0. NL your #yTorch #yHead loses #b1 #yAggro whenever they lose HP.
#yCollectibles are placed here in combat. Contains 4 #yLucky #yWick at the start of a run.
This card starts in the #yCollection in combat
This card shuffles into the Collect pile in when played instead of going to the Discard pile, increasing Damage and Block Gain by the shown value.
You may #yexhaust a card in your hand to trigger an extra effect.

A card in #yStasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus #b1. NL Turn counter is reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn. NL When the counter reaches #b0, it is returned to your hand and costs #b0 until played.
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop, removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
